content:
Hi all,

In this CDS Service endpoint / fhir server: https://cds-sandbox.alphora.com/cqf-ruler-r4/ , do you know if the mapping described here https://www.hl7.org/fhir/clinicalreasoning-cds-on-fhir.html is implemented in this endpoint ? or is it a custom mapping between cds hooks "artefacts" and fhir "artefacts" ? I have not been able to find information about this endpoint and it is cited in one of the tutorials by hl7 as a CDS Service sandbox...

my second question is, how can I access CDS Hooks Context "artefacts" especially regarding order-select hook using CQL code ?

Thanks for your help

It is intended as an implementation of that mapping, yes. For a walkthrough of something that builds artifacts, loads them in to a sandbox and tests them, see: https://github.com/alphora/cqf-ccc/blob/master/WALKTHROUGH.md

Thanks Bryn for the link, very interesting and helpful. An other question please: is it possible to access cds hooks context from a cql code using parameter, someting like that:

parameter ContextPrescriptions List<MedicationRequest>

That mapping right now isn't very sophisticated, but it will pick up a single list-valued parameter in the CQL and bind that to the hook context. I submitted an issue to enhance that binding support to bind by context parameters from the hook by name to parameters in the CQL. https://github.com/DBCG/org-opencds-cqf-cds/issues/41
Thanks Bryn, your reply is very helpful,
Abdelali Boussadi has marked this topic as resolved.
